metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5695 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Designate 2015.1.0 through 1.0.0.0b1 as packaged in OpenStack Kilo does not enforce RecordSets per domain, and Records per RecordSet quotas when processing an internal zone file transfer, which might allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a crafted resource record set.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5695` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

designate - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-agent - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-api - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-central - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-common - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-mdns - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-pool-manager - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-sink - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
designate-zone-manager - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
python-designate - 1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: designate package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.1.0-0ubuntu1').
